description: Runs I(puppet) agent or apply in a reliable manner

logdest.description: Where the puppet logs should go, if puppet apply is being used

execute.description: Execute a specific piece of Puppet code. It has no effect with a puppetmaster.

certname.description: The name to use when handling certificates.

tags.description: A comma-separated list of puppet tags to be used.

puppetmaster.description: The hostname of the puppetmaster to contact.

facter_basename.description: Basename of the facter output file

manifest.description: Path to the manifest file to run puppet apply on.

timeout.description: How long to wait for I(puppet) to finish.

facts.description: A dict of values to pass in as persistent external facter facts

modulepath.description: Path to an alternate location for puppet modules
